name: Lizard Crash
description:
It's time to get your "City Monster" license.

Follow the goals given by your instructor and it should be OK.

Good luck!

Controls:

  • Keyboard:
    • Arrows / WASD : Move
    • v / RMB : Fireball
    • N / LMB : Tail Attack
    • B / Space : Jump
    • R: Reset the level
  • XBox 360:
    • Left Joystick: Move
    • B: Fireball
    • X : Tail Attack
    • A : Jump
    • Back : Reset the level
  • Credits:
    • Alice Moirot
    • Angeline Daquin
    • Antoine Semblat (Twitter / Patreon)
